activities: Revegy is a software company that allows sales professionals to enter information into a computer software system regarding the individuals within a prospective client that they are selling to.  Information  such as name, title, email, and phone are collected and entered into the system.  The data is then used internally by the sales professional to create a sales strategy and track his/her progress for selling to these individuals.  Access to this information is limited to only the individuals entering the information, his/her manager, and any designated colleagues also working with the prospective client.
eucountries: Austria, Belgium, Czech Republic, Denmark, Finland, France, Germany, Greece, Hungary, Ireland, Italy, Netherlands, Norway, Poland, Portugal, Romania, Slovakia, Slovenia, Spain, Sweden, Switzerland, United Kingdom
personaldata: On-line data: entered by clients for clients use only
